fullText: Kate Burton gives a performance of such intelligence and wit that she almost single-handedly makes Somerset Maugham's 1926 comedy worth reviving.
dtliExcerpt: Kate Burton gives a performance of such intelligence and wit that she almost single-handedly makes Somerset Maugham's 1926 comedy worth reviving.
